mapper.select: select ticket.tid, tname, bname, telephone, address, price, ssid from tivattravel.ticket, tivattravel.business where ticket.bid=business.bid and tid=#{tid};
select count(*) as collectionNum from ticket, collection where ticket.tid=collection.tid and ticket.tid=#{tid};
select sname, path from tivattravel.scenery where sid=#{sid};
